sourcesContent:
<template>

  <TheEmployeeList></TheEmployeeList>
  <EmployeeDetail
    v-if="showEmployeeDetail"
    :closeFunction="onCloseEmployeeDetail"
  ></EmployeeDetail>
  <!-- <m-dialog v-if="showDialog" :closeFunction="onCloseDialog"></m-dialog> -->
</template>
<script>
import EmployeeDetail from "@/views/employee/EmployeeDetail.vue";
import TheEmployeeList from "@/views/employee/EmployeeList.vue";

export default {
  name: "ContainerEmployee",
  components: {
    EmployeeDetail,
    TheEmployeeList,
  },
  methods: {
    onShowEmployeeDetail() {
      this.showEmployeeDetail = true;
    },
    onCloseEmployeeDetail() {
      this.showEmployeeDetail = false;
    },
  },
  data() {
    return {
      showEmployeeDetail: false,
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style></style>
